1.name: Harvey Norgenbloom
1.about: CPA, recently divorced father of two with a dark sexual secret

1.name: Death Wish
1.about: He's always first through the door

1.name: Pineapples
1.about: Also called the same by his grandma

1.name: Detective Bart Barley
1.about: Tightly wound, hates violence against animals

1.name: Carl 'Mangy Carl' Mangerman
1.about: Homeless gentleman, personal assistant to Doug Judy

1.name: Roger Strikewell
1.about: Won a radio contest to be a guest auctioneer

1.name: Rex Buckingham
1.about: British secret agent, ballistics expert, and ladies' man

1.name: Vic Kovac
1.about: Ex-Navy SEAL who is double-crossed and left for dead

1.name: Duncan Buck
1.about: Raised on an oil rig by 90 men and 1 prostitute

2.name: Vaughn Tom Tucker
2.about: A gruff, spitting, punch-you-in-the-gut sailor man who's taking a little break on dry land, but just until his girlfriend, Cangela, gets out of lady jail.

2.name: Dante Thunderstone
2.about: Stole his first car at the tender age of nine. Has had to fend for himself since his mother was struck by lightning while she was pregnant with him. She passed, he lived. Some say that makes Zeus his dad.

2.name: Francis Gruber
2.about: His brother, Hans, died at Nakatomi Tower at the hands of John McClane. He's also related to Jeremy Irons from the third one.

2.name: Johnny
2.about: Newly Engaged. Loves Dora's face and attached physique. Also there's no one else's opinion who he cares about more than hers. Loves Boinking Dora

3.name: Sherwin Lamonde
3.about: Sculptor, painter, full-time barista. But once he sells his first piece, part-time barista.

3.name: Larry Sherbet
3.about: After being placed in the witness protection program and relocated to Coral Palms, Florida.

3.name: Alamo
3.about: Associates of Tex Dallas, Black Fred and Reno Vegas. Has ties to cowboy mafia.

4.name: Henri Renault
4.about: Cat burglar on vacation from France who went to an elite international school so he doesn't speak with an accent.

4.name: The Barracuda
4.about: Jake says to Victor Santiago that he calls himself that and that

4.name: Carl Mangerson
4.about: Lawyer of Maxime Dubois, who's an international millionaire and doesn't speak any English.

4.name: Tank Hendricks
4.about: Beloved by mothers, lives at 100 Charming Ave.

5.name: Billy 'Big Time' Jankowski
5.about: Wears sunglasses, headphones, and an unwashed hoodie. He gambles online from his mother's basement, where he lives. He's also a virgin.

5.name: Det. Jacob Sherlock Peralta
5.about: Had his name legally changed. For him it is just elementary.

5.name: Dr. Albrin Einstibe
5.about: Knows that the Greek didn't climb out of the Trojan horse's butt.

5.name: Axel Richards
5.about: Driving stolen cars since I was six years old. Had to use a Wiffle Ball bat to just reach the gas pedal, and I never learned to use the brakes.Things went south when I got addicted to drugs after my best friend died in an active shooter situation

6.name: The Tattler
6.about: Back in the high school, Jake was accused of 'tattling' his friend, Brandon Bliss. Soon, all of his friends started calling him 'The Tattler'. Jake spent the rest of his high school as The Tattler. However, it is later revealed that Gina was the real 'Tattler'.

6.name: Jackson Fox
6.about: NBA player, is best friends with LeBron James.

6.name: Garrett
6.about: Has multiple personality disorder, including Tatiana, a British mischievous seven-year-old girl.

7.name: Sean
7.about: Jake's criminal alias to hang out with Doug Judy's friends. Sent to prison for 5 years for elder abuse.

7.name: Kevin Cozner
7.about: When Cheddar was kidnapped, the kidnapper demanded Kevin bring a specific file to get the dog back. Not wanting his husband in danger, Captain Holt had Jake and Kevin switch personas, and Jake went to the tradeoff disguised as Kevin.
